This is a standalone MOD to change appearance of Farkas (Only above the neck).



[/size][i][size=4][b]Requirement[/b][/size][/i][size=3]

[/size]Only Skyrim.
[b][i][size=4]

[/size][/i][/b][/font][b][i][font=Times New Roman][size=4]How to Install[/size][/font][/i][/b]
